amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate that housing vouchers are a critical resource and that the Department of Housing and Urban Development should ensure that all vouchers can be used by low-income families.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2183 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2183 proposed by Senator Bond for Senator Sarbanes to Amendment SA 2150. (consideration: CR S14520-14524; ; text: CR S14521) To express the sense of the Senate that housing vouchers are a critical resource and that the Department of Housing and Urban Development should ensure that all vouchers can be used by low-income families.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2183 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2183 proposed by Senator Bond for Senator Sarbanes to Amendment SA 2150.
